verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees.<s%> Out of the <S%H4615>depths<s%> have I <S%H7121>cried<s%> to you, O <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
<S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice:<s%> let your <S%H241>ears<s%> be <S%H7183>attentive<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications.<s%>
But there is <S%H5547>forgiveness<s%> with you, that you may be <S%H3372>feared.<s%>
I <S%H6960>wait<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> does <S%H6960>wait,<s%> and in his <S%H1697>word<s%> do I <S%H3176>hope.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> waits for the <S%H136>Lord<s%> more than they that <S%H8104>watch<s%> for the <S%H1242>morning:<s%> I say, more than they that <S%H8104>watch<s%> for the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>
Let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3176>hope<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for with the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> there is <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> and with him is <S%H7235>plenteous<s%> <S%H6304>redemption.<s%>
